quests.name: Storm Watcher
quests.description: The ranger has asked you to witness the power of nature by observing a rainstorm.
quests.rewardDescription: Knowledge of weather patterns and nature's wisdom

objectives.description: Experience a rainstorm in any location

quests.name: Sacred Pilgrimage
quests.description: The priest has blessed your journey and asks you to visit a chapel to complete your spiritual preparation.

quests.name: Mountain Wisdom
quests.description: The hermit speaks of ancient knowledge hidden in the mountains. Seek out the high places.

quests.name: Aquatic Research
quests.description: The scholar needs observations of lake ecosystems for their research. Visit a lake and observe its tranquil waters.

objectives.description: Visit and observe a lake biome

quests.name: Fortress Reconnaissance
quests.description: The warrior asks you to scout ancient fortifications. Find and explore a castle.

quests.name: Misty Visions
quests.description: The mermaid speaks of visions that come with the fog. Witness the mysterious mists.
quests.rewardDescription: Mystical insights and water magic knowledge

quests.name: Traveler's Tales
quests.description: A fellow adventurer suggests visiting inns to hear stories from other travelers.
quests.rewardDescription: Stories and travel wisdom from other adventurers

quests.name: Winter's Silence
quests.description: The ranger speaks of the peaceful meditation that comes with snowfall. Experience winter's quiet beauty.
quests.rewardDescription: Inner peace and winter survival knowledge
